parameter.name: [portSdpInviter]
parameter.description: Port pour le bloc sdp de l'inviter du XMLloader

scenario.sendMessageSIP:
INVITE sip:[invitee]@[domainName] SIP/2.0 To: sip:[invitee]@[domainName] From: "[inviter]" <sip:[inviter]@[domainName]>;tag=[localTag] Via: SIP/2.0/UDP [localHostSIP]:[localPortSIP];branch=[newBranchId] Call-ID: [newCallId] CSeq: [localCseqNumber] INVITE Max-Forwards: 70 Proxy-Authorization: IMS_GPRS_SCHEMA token="999" Allow: INVITE, ACK, BYE, CANCEL, REFER, MESSAGE, SUBSCRIBE, NOTIFY, PUBLISH Contact: <sip:[inviter]@[localHostSIP]:[localPortSIP]> Supported: timer User-Agent: PoC-client/OMA1.0 XmlLoader/v0.0 Session-Expires: 3600;refresher=uac Accept-Contact: +g.poc.talkburst;require;explicit P-Alerting-Mode: manual P-Asserted-Identity: "Bruno" <sip:[inviter]@[domainName]>,<tel:+3381164951574> P-Charging-Vector: icid-value=0.6645971655716005;ggsn=139.10.69.237;pdp-sig=yes;gcid=60ee19cf;auth-token=0.4849361942495226 P-com.Siemens.MSISDN-ID: 3381164951574 P-com.Siemens.IMSI-ID: 81164951574 P-com.Siemens.SGSN-ID: 139.10.69.237 P-Charging-Function-Addresses: ccf=139.10.99.99;ccf_sec=139.10.99.99 Content-Type: multipart/mixed;boundary="----=_Part_0" Route: <sip:[invitee]@[remoteHostSIP]:[remotePortSIP];lr;mode=originating> Route: <sip:[inviter]@[localHostSIP]:[localPortSIP];lr;mode=terminating> Content-Length: x
------=_Part_0 Content-Type: application/sdp
v=0 o=[inviter] 999 999 IN IP4 [localHostRTP] s=- c=IN IP4 [localHostRTP] t=0 0 m=audio [localPortRTP] RTP/AVP 97 a=rtpmap:97 amr/8000/1 a=fmtp:97 mode-set=1;octet-align=1;crc=0 a=+g.poc.talkburst a=maxptime:200 a=ptime:200
------=_Part_0 Content-Type: application/resource-lists+xml Content-Disposition: recipient-list
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <resource-lists xmlns="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:resource-lists" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <list> <entry uri="[inviter]"/> </list> </resource-lists> ------=_Part_0--

ACK [Request-URI] SIP/2.0 To: [To] From: [From] Call-ID: [CallId] CSeq: [localCseqNumber] ACK Via: SIP/2.0/UDP [localHostSIP]:[localPortSIP];branch=[newBranchId] Contact: <sip:[inviter]@[localHostSIP]:[localPortSIP]> Route: <sip:[invitee]@[remoteHostSIP]:[remotePortSIP];lr;mode=originating> Route: <sip:[inviter]@[localHostSIP]:[localPortSIP];lr;mode=terminating> Max-Forwards: 70 User-Agent: PoC-client/OMA1.0 XmlLoader/v0.0 Proxy-Authorization: IMS_GPRS_SCHEMA token="999" Allow: INVITE, ACK, CANCEL, BYE, NOTIFY Content-Length: 0

finally.sendMessageSIP: BYE sip:[inviter]@[domainName] SIP/2.0 To: [To] From: [From] Call-ID: [CallId] CSeq: [newCseqNumber] BYE Route: <sip:[inviter]@[remoteHostSIP]:[remotePortSIP];lr;mode=originating> Route: <sip:[invitee]@[localHostSIP]:[localPortSIP];lr;mode=terminating> Contact: <sip:[invitee]@[localHostSIP]:[localPortSIP]> Via: SIP/2.0/UDP [localHostSIP]:[localPortSIP];branch=[newBranchId] Proxy-Authorization: IMS_GPRS_SCHEMA token="999" User-Agent: PoC-client/OMA1.0 XmlLoader/v0.0 Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Length: 0
